_comment_accounts: Define initial accounts with IDs and balances
_comment_transfers: List of transfers to execute concurrently. Note: opposing transfers (A→B and B→A) will trigger deadlock in Phase 1

simulation._comment_delay: Artificial delay between lock acquisitions to increase deadlock probability
simulation._comment_timeout: Max seconds to wait before declaring a deadlock
simulation._comment_verbose: Enable detailed logging of lock operations
